title: GARLIC CHEESE FISH
directions: Place garlic in a microwaveable cup; add butter and heat about 20 seconds until butter is hot and mixed with garlic. Slice a groove or "pocket" most of the way through fish steak, from one side to the other, and stuff with feta cheese. Place in baking dish. Drizzle the garlic-butter mixture over the top and onto the cheese. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 15 minutes. Ahi should be rare inside for best flavor, but salmon should flake easily.
Ahi is best served slightly red in the center, unlike some other fish. Salmon should be flaky. Serve with rice and vegetables.
